body: Man.

This is the best thing in this site, I like to believe ShindoL did this to teach us a lesson, disguised as a hentai story
If this stuff is for fapping usage, then I'm out.
@Altis Are u as retarded as u sound or are u  just  a dumb teenager?
This is just hentai-realism. Brilliant job ShindoL.

This, is more of an experience than something to get off to. Although I guarantee some people love this stuff, most will see this as a sad tale that has the possibilty to be so brutality real it sickens them. I believe ShindoL has created something nearly impossible to surpass, a story too horrible it can't be topped. And for that, I say congratulations, ShindoL, you've left a scar, maybe even on some poor souls who stumbled on this accidently.

This story is a true work of art. This is something that cannot be fapped to, and really, truly captures everything wrong with society today. Where hentai tends to only have a small piece of the whole truth in it, ShindoL put months of work into this manga and captured what could only be a whole truth for some women and girls in this world, and it truly makes one contemplate on life and what we can do to better it so that no one may have to become a Saki.
Emiliatan, I did. This is not smthg you out on a fap site....
No. No no no no. Fuck you. Fuck you, realistic piece of mastershit, fuck. You.
Indeed, this is just too sad. Shindol, for this and all the ntr you had done, you gonna burn in the hell... Despite that, please continue doing your fucking awesome work.
This is sad... who can fap to this?
All she wanted was to fit in :(. These are the times I wish I can jump into the pages and destroy the people who hurt her. Every single one of them. Not one will go unaccounted for.
